duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a strategic framework for assessing and implementing content and programs that grow loyal audiences, Cash App brand awareness, and cultural equity.
Lead and manage the program calendar across all content streams, leveraging existing plans, cultural moments, and audience data and analytics to maximize value.
Project manage across diverse creative, editorial, and partnerships organizations to create new business concepts.
Leverage cross-functional opportunities to amplify plans from individual lines of business by programming to audiences across multiple platforms.
Define and track relevant KPIs and targets, aligned to longer-term plans across the business.
Partner with the creative team to direct editorial standards across all editorial touchpoints, ensuring a consistent voice, tone, and level of quality.
Identify gaps and opportunities in content programming and work across the organization to develop strategies that deliver shared goals.
Represent editorial strategy, rationale, and decisions to external partners and internal collaborators.
Develop editorial policy and implement a robust system of content optimization, internal controls, and risk management processes.
Partner closely with brand, marketing, and communications teams to build support plans for top business priorities/initiatives.

education_certification.credential: 7+ years in editorial, content development, event management, or role equivalent fields, with an emphasis on content strategy.
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
